lead_paragraph: Buster Posey didn't get called up by the San Francisco Giants this season until May, but he accomplished a lot. Including becoming the first rookie to be the regular starting catcher for a World Series champion in more than 40 years.
snippet: Buster Posey, much like Andy Etchebarren of the 1966 Orioles, is a rookie catcher with a championship ring and a young dominant pitching staff to work with.

headline.main: In Posey and Pitchers, Shades of an Earlier Champion

abstract: Buster Posey, much like Andy Etchebarren of the 1966 Orioles, is a rookie catcher with a championship ring and a young dominant pitching staff to work with.
